readable.title: 3495453699_1c9faedf3c
readable.content: A man poses for a little girl , his arms outstretched , with a large church in the background . A man standing on one foot with a little girl in front of a cathedral . A man stands on one leg in a playful pose near a lamppost as a young girl looks on . The back of a little girl with braids and a man in a ' plane ' pose before her . The man is posing in front of a small child near a light post .
